rows.label: qst710303_msg0001
rows.name:
You took your time! How goes the
collection?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0101
rows.name:
Marvelous! That looks like all the
parts I need, yes!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0102
rows.name:
You have keen eyes, my fledgling
friends!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0103
rows.name:
Behold, my life's work...
I call it Gennai's Special Patented
Jamming Megaphone!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0104
rows.name:
Its perfectly-tuned mechanism cancels
out any noise from the surroundings,
and magnifies the user's voice!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0105
rows.name:
And since surely, everyone loves the
sound of their own voice, there's no
need for an "off" switch! I'm brilliant!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0106
rows.name:
Hm? How far does the magnified voice
carry, you ask? Ugh, what are you guys,
Health & Safety inspectors...? Sheesh...

rows.label: qst710303_msg0107
rows.name:
Thanks to my ingenious directionalizing
technology, any voice you feed it, no
matter how loud, will carry ten melts!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0108
rows.name:
Right, just about as far as if you shout.
That's pretty much the point! Gahaha!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0109
rows.name:
Here, I'll share the recipe with you all,
so you can take my groundbreaking
invention out into the world!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0110
rows.name:
It seems your contributions have
allowed me to stay aloft after all.

rows.label: qst710303_msg0111
rows.name:
This marks the beginning of a new era
of inventions! Why, before you know it,
I'll be a household name!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0112
rows.name:
People will bow and scrape before me,
begging for one of my creations!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0113
rows.name:
And I owe it in part to you keen-eyed
kiddywinks! Bravo. Well done indeed!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0201
rows.name:
No, no, I'm afraid I'm still going
to need more parts to finish off
my invention.

rows.label: qst710303_msg0202
rows.name: I trust you will help me out?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0203
rows.name:
Do you know the bright red coils with
high thermal conductivity found in
Gula?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll be needing plenty of those for my
next invention.

rows.label: qst710303_msg0205
rows.name:
If you find any, make sure you get
them to me ASAP!
